ifInOctets.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters.

ifInUcastPackets.description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer.

ifOutErrors.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

ifOutOctets.description: The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters.

ifOutUcastPackets.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

ifNet.description: Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

high utilization.description: Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifInErrors.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifInOctets.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifInUcastPackets.description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifOperStatus.createCmd:
RRA:LAST:0.5:1:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:1:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:6:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:24:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:288:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:6:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:24:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:288:600
ifOperStatus.description: Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifOutErrors.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifOutOctets.description: The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifOutUcastPackets.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

/zport/dmd/Devices/Storage/NetApp/SNMP|e.description: Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

high utilization.description: Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold

ifHCInOctets.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifInOctets.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifHCInUcastPkts.description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer.  This object is a 64-bit version of ifInUcastPkts.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifHCOutOctets.description: The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifHCOutOctets.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifHCOutUcastPkts.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent. This object is a 64-bit version of ifHCOutUcastPkts.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifInErrors.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifOperStatus.createCmd:
RRA:LAST:0.5:1:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:1:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:6:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:24:600
RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:288:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:6:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:24:600
RRA:MAX:0.5:288:600
ifOperStatus.description: Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

ifOutErrors.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.
Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.

/zport/dmd/Devices/Storage/NetApp/SNMP|e.description: Template for 64-bit interface counters.  Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.
